author: stsp
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/patch.c: Prune more unnecessary includes and
sort the remaining headers alphabetically while here.

author: rhuijben
msg: Continuing work on issue #1711, deprecate a bunch of svn_path_*()
functions. All callers should be updated to call either svn_dirent_*()
(for local paths) or svn_uri_*() (for URLs and other paths).
Note that for WC-NG we are switching to absolute dirents everywhere in
libsvn_wc; so further cleanup is welcome :)

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r39070, remove reference to private/svn_patch.h.
Also rewrap the lines to be more readable in diffs

author: hwright
msg: Punt on requiring consumers of svn_wc__node_walk_children() in libsvn_client
to determine hidden-ness on their own by adding a show_hidden parameter to
said function.  We currently don't expose the ability for these consumers
to determine hidden-ness, and adding this parameter helps facilitate a
smoother transition away from entries and access batons.
(walker_helper): Add show_hidden parameter and filter based upon it.
(svn_wc__node_walk_children): Add show_hidden parameter, and pass it to

author: hwright
msg: Update the changelist functions to use svn_wc_set_changelist2(), and remove
(set_entry_changelist): Update the caller to use svn_wc_set_changelist2(),
and don't worry about fetching any access batons.
Don't set the access baton baton member.
